instructions: Open the App Switcher using one of the following methods: iPhone X and later: Drag one finger up from the bottom edge of the screen until you feel the second vibration or hear the third sound, then lift your finger. Other models: Double-click the Home button. To browse the open apps, swipe left or right until the app you want is selected. Double-tap to open the app.
Tap the status bar at the top of the screen. Swipe left or right to hear the time, battery state, Wi-Fi signal strength, and more.
Tap anywhere on the Home screen outside the status bar. Swipe down with three fingers.

Go to Settings > Accessibility . Tap either Volume Key Shortcut or Accessibility Shortcut . A screen will appear explaining how to toggle your accessibility apps on and off. You typically need to hold down both volume keys or tap a specific button three times.
